item.title: 显示HN：封闭链接
item.description:
封闭链接引入了一个非常简单但功能强大的模型，可通过一次性访问链接提供安全的匿名共享，而访问链接不会留下可追溯的发送者指纹。 Unlike conventional tools that prioritize persistence and traceability, ClosedLinks is purpose-built for interactions where privacy, control, and non-attribution are essential.If interested to try it out, check out - https://www.closedlinks.comIf您想了解更多有关我为何构建它以及如何工作的更多信息，请查看白皮书 - https：//www.closedlinks.comcomcomcoms.comcoms.com/white-paper//white-paper/
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=44699280 点：1 ＃评论：0

item.title: Show HN：我为整个YouTube频道建立了AI聊天
item.description:
hi hn 我想要一种Q＆amp; a带有教育渠道的方法，我经常观看，例如个人发展，编码或建筑初创公司。 But didn't want to go through the hassle of manually searching for the relevant content for the questions I had.I wanted a tool to help me grow on YouTube by analyzing competitors to spot patterns in their content and see what makes them perform so well, and repurpose it for my channel.And sometimes I just wanted to recall something I heard before in a podcast, but didn't want to go through the entire channel or video to get the answer.So I built Transifr.io。它的工作原理： >输入视频URL或频道句柄。 >视频成绩单被提取并处理抹布。 >询问有关视频或频道的任何信息。 >通过精确的视频/时间戳参考获取答案。现在，我可以单击几下即可将整个YouTube频道作为单个知识基础聊天。我没有观看数百个小时的启动学校视频，办公时间和创始人的访谈，而只是问我的具体问题，并通过整个视频库中的确切时间戳恢复答案。在这里尝试： https://transcribr.io $ 19.99/周或$ 49.99/mo-无限用法很想听听您的用例。
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=446999240 点：1 ＃评论：0
